title: Pageau, Jordan Peterson, Patterns, God and Resurrection
description:
Is matter foundational and patterns derivative or is, as JP and JBP both say is reality at base made up of patterns? JP found patterns via church fathers, JBP via psychology, Jung, Piaget, and some Russians. 

After last night's meetup at Living Stones some things really came together. Here are some thoughts. 

Jonathan Pageau with David Fuller on Rebel Wisdom https://youtu.be/R2JNWATMi9w

Jordan Peterson with Roger Scruton at Cambridge https://youtu.be/XvbtKAYdcZY 

JBP with Dave Rubin and Ben Shapiro https://youtu.be/1opHWsHr798 

Buddhism and Cognitive Science https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCz-xSgYNrI2r2VgkCZLn_1w 

NT Wright Resurrection of the Son of God https://www.amazon.com/Resurrection-Son-God-V3-Christian-ebook/dp/B00B1VG66E

CS Lewis Miracles https://www.amazon.com/Miracles-C-S-Lewis-ebook/dp/B002BY77FY 

For the audio podcast mirror on Podbean http://paulvanderklay.podbean.com/

To listen to this on ITunes https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/paul-vanderklays-podcast/id1394314333 

If you need the RSS feed for your podcast player https://paulvanderklay.podbean.com/feed/ 

To support this channel/podcast on Patreon https://www.patreon.com/paulvanderklay
Paypal: https://paypal.me/paulvanderklay

Join the Sacramento JBP Meetup https://www.meetup.com/Sacramento-Jordan-Peterson-Meetup/

Paul's Church Content at Living Stones Channel https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCh7bdktIALZ9Nq41oVCvW-A

You can donate to Living Stones CRC to support this work here http://www.livingstonescrc.org/donate 
Donations may be tax deductible for taxpayers of the United States
